price: ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߊߘߋ߲߫ ߟߎ߯ߕߎ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūna
